title: Navaratna Jhumki Studs: A Symphony of Tradition and Sparkle
materials: Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant finish.
features: Intricately crafted floral design with a central Ruby surrounded by the auspicious Navaratnas. The jhumki stud features delicate openwork filigree enhanced with sparkling diamonds. The traditional 'Mugappu' design subtly showcases the beauty of the nine gemstones.
colors: Primarily gold with a vibrant mix of gemstone hues including deep red (Ruby)
creating a vibrant and auspicious palette.
occasions: and special celebrations like housewarmings (గృహప్రవేశం). Also suitable for adding a touch of heritage to modern occasions.
description: Embrace the timeless elegance and auspiciousness of Navaratna jewelry. Each gemstone is carefully selected for its quality and astrological significance, bringing prosperity and well-being to the wearer. The intricate craftsmanship reflects the rich heritage of Hyderabad's jewelry tradition. Durable and designed to last generations.
